#Archimedean Spiral
$$x=(\alpha+\beta\theta)\cos(\theta)$$
$$y=(\alpha+\beta\theta)\sin(\theta)$$
In the following picture, $\alpha=0$ and $\beta=1$.
```{r Archimedean_Spiral,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,echo=FALSE,fig.align="center",fig.height=8,fig.width=8}
library(ggplot2)
theta=seq(from=0,to=87.96,by=0.01)
alpha=0
beta=1
x=(alpha+beta*theta)*cos(theta)
y=(alpha+beta*theta)*sin(theta)
d=data.frame(x,y)
ggplot(d,aes(x,y))+
  geom_point(color="black",size=0.1)+
  geom_path(color="mediumorchid")
```
